entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain at times heavy in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then becoming south 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along exposed areas of the coast in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 mm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along exposed areas of the coast early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the evening then west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
